title: tools/cmd/stringer: could not import C (cgo)
body:
What does 'go version' print?

go version devel +efd786846a76 Tue Nov 25 16:00:25 2014 -0500 darwin/amd64

~/src/golang.org/x/tools/cmd/stringer  
‚ùØ hg log   
changeset:   1263:d1f8dded1ce1

What steps reproduce the problem?

Simplified example: http://play.golang.org/p/QilWsKuxXr

1. Use stringer on a file that also contains import "C".
2. Run "go generate"
3. Or use stringer directly: stringer -type=EventFlags demo.go

What happened?

stringer: checking package: demo.go:7:8: could not import C (can't find import: C)

What should have happened instead?

Ignored the C import?

Please provide any additional information below.
